basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Christian Do, an IT Project Coordinator and Software Developer with a passion for innovation and collaboration. I strive to create solutions that drive efficiency and success, believing that continuous learning and adaptation are key to growth. My philosophy centers on the belief that strong communication, critical thinking, and a dedication to quality work can transform challenges into opportunities. My ultimate goal is to contribute meaningfully to the tech industry, using my expertise in project management and software development to deliver impactful, client-focused solutions.

projects.title: Capstone Project
projects.description: BUDGET BOSS is a financial budgeting app designed to make personal finance management simple and intuitive. The app offers key features like income and expense tracking, customizable budget planning, and reminders to help users stay on top of their finances

projects.title: Let Go Travel Web
projects.description: The Let's Go Travel web application is a travel platform where customers can book flights, hotels, and rental cars. Users can create an account and manage their bookings.

projects.title: Library Management
projects.description: This library python application provides users with a user-friendly interface to search for books by title, author, or category. Each book in the library is represented by a unique book ID, along with essential information such as title, author, category, quantity, and availability status.

projects.title: Learning Path Creator
projects.description: The Learning Path Creator is a web-based platform facilitating a community-driven learning approach. Users can create, share, and explore curated lists of educational resources, termed learning paths, on various topics. Each learning path is a resource sequence that guides learners through the material necessary to grasp a particular subject.

projects.title: Flight Reservation system
projects.description: a Flight Reservation system with a complete graphical user interface using C#

projects.title: Lovely Pet
projects.description: Lovely Pet is a user-friendly platform that allows individuals to discover adoptable pets within their area. Users can easily search for pets based on species and postal code, ensuring they find the perfect companion nearby. The website prioritizes seamless navigation, accessibility, and up-to-date information on available pets, fostering a reliable adoption experience for potential pet owners.

projects.title: Host to Host Solutions
projects.description: This project encompasses the comprehensive oversight of implementing Cash Management Products for both local corporate and multinational clients. Responsibilities include managing the end-to-end implementation process, ensuring compliance with product-specific documentation requirements, collaborating closely with regional product and IT teams to customize solutions, and maintaining exceptional customer satisfaction through regular service level reviews and corrective actions.

projects.title: Inward/Outward Automation via Vietnam Banking Clearing System
projects.description: This project aims to automate inward and outward transactions through the Vietnam Banking Clearing system. By integrating our systems with the clearing system and developing automated processes, we aim to streamline transaction handling, improving efficiency and accuracy. Key tasks include system integration, process automation, testing, and user training. Successful implementation will reduce manual intervention, speed up transaction processing, and enhance operational efficiency.

projects.title: Hotel VAT Invoice Printing Program Rollout
projects.description: This project involves rolling out a new VAT invoice printing program for hotels. The initiative aims to implement a streamlined and efficient system for generating VAT invoices, enhancing accuracy and compliance with tax regulations. Key tasks include program installation, configuration, testing, and staff training. The project aims to improve invoice management processes, ensuring timely and accurate VAT invoice generation for hotel transactions.
